message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this valuable product from me. I believe it's a unique and exclusive opportunity for you. As we start our negotiation, I'd like to make an initial offer of $900000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's value to you is $800000. I'm confident you'll find it a reasonable starting point for our discussion.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering a revised price of $875000. This is a significant concession from my initial offer, and I believe it's a fair compromise. I'm eager to hear your thoughts and see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $862500. I'm trying to find a price that works for both of us.

I understand your desire to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to go below $880000. I'm willing to make one more concession to try to reach an agreement. I'm offering a revised price of $877500. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident it's a fair compromise. I'm eager to hear your thoughts and see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concessions, but I'm still at $862500. I'm trying to find a price that works for both of us, and I think this is a fair price for the product.

I understand your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $870000. I'm willing to make one more concession to try to reach an agreement. I'm offering a revised price of $868000. This is a very competitive price, and I'm confident it's a fair compromise. I'm eager to hear your thoughts and see if we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still at $862500. I think this is a fair price for the product, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
